error.cannot-modify-role: The role '{ roleCode }' cannot be modified
error.cannot-move-product-category-into-self: Cannot move a ProductCategory into itself
error.cannot-transition-order-from-to: Cannot transition Order from "{ fromState }" to "{ toState }"
error.cannot-transition-to-shipping-when-order: Cannot transition Order to the "ArrangingShipping" state when it is empty
error.cannot-transition-to-payment-without-cus: Cannot transition Order to the "ArrangingPayment" state without Customer details
error.channel-not-found: No channel with the token "{ token }" exists
error.country-code-not-valid: The countryCode "{ countryCode }" was not recognized
error.email-address-not-verified: Please verify this email address before logging in
error.entity-has-no-translation-in-language: Translatable entity '{ entityName }' has not been translated into the requested language ({ languageCode })
error.entity-with-id-not-found: No { entityName } with the id '{ id }' could be found
error.forbidden: You are not currently authorized to perform this action
error.invalid-sort-field: The sort field '{ fieldName }' is invalid. Valid fields are: { validFields }
error.no-search-plugin-configured: No search plugin has been configured
error.no-valid-channel-specified: No valid channel was specified (ensure the 'vendure-token' header was specified in the request)
error.order-contents-may-only-be-modified-in-a: Order contents may only be modified when in the "AddingItems" state
error.order-does-not-contain-line-with-id: This order does not contain an OrderLine with the id { id }
error.order-item-quantity-must-be-positive: { quantity } is not a valid quantity for an OrderItem
error.payment-may-only-be-added-in-arrangingpa: A Payment may only be added when Order is in "ArrangingPayment" state
error.verification-token-has-expired: Verification token has expired. Use refreshCustomerVerification to send a new token.
error.unauthorized: The credentials did not match. Please check and try again

message.country-used-in-addresses: The selected Country cannot be deleted as it is used in {count, plural, one {1 Address} other {# Addresses}}

message.facet-value-force-deleted: The selected FacetValue was removed from {products, plural, =0 {} one {1 Product} other {# Products}}{both, select, both { , } single {}}{variants, plural, =0 {} one {1 ProductVariant} other {# ProductVariants}} and deleted
message.facet-value-used: The selected FacetValue is assigned to {products, plural, =0 {} one {1 Product} other {# Products}}{both, select, both { , } single {}}{variants, plural, =0 {} one {1 ProductVariant} other {# ProductVariants}}
